description: Perfect space for a romantic woodsy ceremony. Featuring ancient oak trees, flowers and lush green open space
Large rustic Main and West Terrace seats 520 guests - include the EastTerrace for a total of 600 guests. Surrounded by acres of lush open space, a park, majestic oaks and flowers.
Beautiful room with historic reclaimed beams, vaulted ceilings, with a chandelier and majestic fireplace. This magnificent centrally-located room can seat up to 600 guests (if side booths are used).
Elegant room features high ceilings, a chandelier and majestic fireplace. A lovely choice for an intimate Event, seating less than 500 guests.

Perfect for a cocktail party, corporate event, private dinner or just to dance the night away , or up to 700 guests. Featuring a built-in wood dance floor,audiovisual equipment and a wonderful view of the Terrace and adjacent park & open space

Seats up to 1000 guests. The Lounge overlooks acres of open space.This space is equipped with itâ€™s own private bar,private patio area, private restrooms, and a bridal suite (extra charge for use of bridal suite)
Large rustic Main and West Terrace seats 1600 guests - include the East Terrace for a total of 1600 guests. Surrounded by acres of lush open space, a park, majestic oaks and flowers
Elegant room features high ceilings, a chandelier andmajestic fireplace. A lovely choice for an intimate Event, seating less than 1500 guests.
